trends: There have been no other sightings in Burns Lake
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy husband left me a message on msn. this is what he said: darkblade sent 1\31\2008 9:07 pm: hello darkblade sent 1\31\2008 9:09 pm: i saw a huge craft rite over me this morning darkblade sent 1\31\2008 9:10 pm: my binoc batteries where dead darkblade sent 1\31\2008 9:10 pm: i am so pissed about that darkblade sent 1\31\2008 9:10 pm: was very exciting darkblade sent 1\31\2008 9:11 pm: i went and got new batteries darkblade sent 1\31\2008 9:11 pm: hope its there in morning darkblade sent 1\31\2008 9:11 pm: new batteries and kentucky fried chicken i missed talking to him because my internet was off. he will be home tonight! he was on his machine. this was approximately 6am. it was still dark. he saw a red light a long distance away. he turned his machine to process a log and when he turned back the light had moved across the valley and had gotten very close to him in seconds. he could see a very large dark craft hovering. it was probably about 5 miles from him. the lights were red and flashing and the craft was sitting still. he estimated the craft to be about the size of our small town. he stopped working and watched it for about 5 minutes before returning to his machine. he didn't notice it leave but when looking the next time it was gone. i am attaching a photo of the area.
